oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hilbert coefficients and depths of form rings
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: JAYANTHAN, AV
SINGH, B
VERMA, JK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: hilbert co-efficients
associated graded rings
cohen-macaulay module
first hilbert coefficient
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We present short and elementary proofs of two theorems of Huckaba and Marley, while generalizing them at the same time to the case of a modulo. The theorems concern a characterization of the depth of the associated graded ring of a Cohen-Macaulay module, with respect to a Hilbert filtration, in terms of the Hilbert coefficient e(1). As an application, we derive bounds on the higher Hilbert coefficient e(i) in terms of e(0).
